data.title: Famous Deaths | Recent Celebrity Passings
data.meta_description: Remembering celebrities and other famous people who have died recently from Eyewitness News WABC-TV Channel 7. Learn more about their life and death.
data.text:
Peter Marshall, 'Hollywood Squares' host and Broadway star, dies at 98

Updated 2 hours ago

The West Virginia-born Marshall was a singer and actor who appeared in films and on Broadway before landing the job in 1966 on "Hollywood Squares," which he would host for more than 5,000 episodes through 1981.
